modmenu.descriptionTranslation.muffins_e: A addon mod for MoriyaShiine's Enchancement. Add a little adjustment for some enchantment to be even more enjoyable.

muffins_enchancement.midnightconfig.axeD: Anything that disable shield cause Movement Stun. Movement Stun disable most of movement by enchantment for couple of seconds.
